about_the_game:
Discover how family bonds can transform your story forever. In Trix the Witching World, you'll follow the journey of Trix, a young witch apprentice living in a world filled with magic. Determined to master her powers, Trix embarks on a charming and challenging adventure. This top-down 2D pixel art RPG offers an immersive experience where every decision and relationship shapes Trix's destiny. Get ready to explore a magical universe and discover the true power of family.

Trix contains a complete battle system:

Combats: The primary attack is your sword, the secondary attacks are magical attacks of the ice element, which can vary between projectiles, area damage or applying freezing effects on enemies.
Rewards: We have complete weapon equipment: boots, gloves, swords, vests, hats and rings. Each item makes specific improvements to Trix's attributes.
Progression: Adapt your gameplay to suit your play style by choosing which attributes best suit your skills.

Berserker mode

Trix has hidden powers that can be activated by defeating enemies, activate berserker mode to obtain unimaginable powers.

Magic Battles

Evolving your magic can provide better attacks with more attributes.

Inventary

Get a complete collection of weapons for your inventory.

Craft magic

Create new spells using old witches' recipes, find the recipes and gather the necessary items to obtain magical powers.

Game features


  • Use melee attacks or magics
  • Manipulate elements to attack your enemies: Wind, Earth, Water and Fire
  • Buff your enemies and yourself
  • Choose the skills you want to use in your gameplay
  • Evolve your character to enable new Skills, Buffs and spells
  • Upgrade your character's attributes, Speed, Life, Strength and Intelligence
  • Equip new clothes and weapons
  • Talk to NPCs to acquire new items
  • Quests scattered across the map
  • Evolve your spells to get more damage
  • Inventory of items
  • 6 maps
  • Over 30 enemies
  • 6 Bosses
